s: The first one is a friendly smile, which is made up of a bright arrow, drawn under the wordmark. The second sign is also connected to the arrow, as it links two letters in the name of the brand, “A” and “Z”, which represents that the store has everything, “From A to Z”.

s: At the beginning of its second year, Amazon introduced its first personalized logo, marking an important step in its visual identity. This emblem featured a black triangle with a diagonal peak. A white line ran through the center of the triangle, symbolizing a path being forged.
